title: New to Boards
body:
Hey,

So I am new to boards and trying to started voting and replying to comments, but it tells me that I need to be at least lvl 7 to post. In game I have been lvl 30 for almost 2 full seasons. Is there some weird leveling system in the boards separate from the game? or is this just a glitch.

Thanks,

Hawkeye556

replies.body: Your Boards and Summoner profiles fall out of sync if you haven't used the boards in a while. This discussion post has caused a sync, so you're level 30 and should have no further issues posting now!
LOL! 1v1 me lets go, I pick the champs.

Hm..... I've encountered this before, but on a normal way. This was when I was on a different platform, (aka server eune, euw et.c). It said just like you said, atleast lvl 7. But as I can see that you're posting from a level 30 account. Obviously a bug. If this keeps going on, turn your direction to the Riot Support and they will help you more than I, hopefully..!

Best wishes, A Kat Main {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Looks like a glitch,

Get rekt.
